mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room (ro_num, ac_id, ro_name, ro_basic_count, ro_max_count, ro_info) VALUES (#{ro_num}, #{ac_id}, #{ro_name}, #{ro_basic_count}, #{ro_max_count}, #{ro_info})
mapper.update: update room set ac_id=#{ac_id}, ro_name=#{ro_name}, ro_basic_count=#{ro_basic_count}, ro_max_count=#{ro_max_count}, ro_info=#{ro_info} where ro_num=#{ro_num}
